items.title: ‘The eye of the hurricane’: Why the U.S. job market has soured, economists say
items.description: Federal data suggests the job market has slowed more than previously thought amid economic headwinds.

items.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Apple, Amazon, Monolithic Power, Reddit and more
items.description: Here are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday Friday.

items.title: BlackRock's Rick Rieder says a half-point rate cut by the Fed in September is possible
items.description: Rieder's comment came after data showed U.S. labor market suffered a sizable slowdown in the past few months.

items.title: Fed governors Bowman, Waller explain their dissents, say waiting to cut rates threatens economy
items.description: Two Federal Reserve officials who voted this week against holding a key interest rate in place explained their decisions Friday.
